name: Deepankar Sachdeva
position: Options Quant at HSBC || IIT KGP '22
about: I am a sophomore at IIT KGP enrolled in its Integrated M.Sc Economics Course. Apart from economics, my interest lies in the field of Applied Data science and Finance. I have a mathematical understanding of Deep Learning and its application in various fields such as error detection, Natural Language Processing, and Computer Vision. Apart from Deep Learning, I am interested in portfolio management, portfolio optimization, risk management and quantitative trading strategies.

current_company.name: HSBC
current_company.title: Options Quant at HSBC || IIT KGP '22

positions.subtitle: Business Club, IIT Kharagpur

positions.title: Sub-Head
positions.description_html: Leading, guiding and mentoring a team of 30 first-year students interested in the field of Finance and Data Science <!---->

positions.subtitle: Business Club, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: B-Club, IIT Kharagpur, is a non-profit organization aiming to familiarize its members, with the technicalities of analytics, finance and consultancy. We strive to enhance our knowledge through in-house workshop, presentation, debates, group discussions. Matters deliberated vary from practical problems to hypothetical ones. The club serves as an excellent interface among students, professionals, faculty and alumni and develops the members into creative thinkers and strategists much before they step into the big world of business.

experience.title: Winter Intern
experience.description: Gaining an in-depth understanding and analyzing Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Internet of Things industry in a variety of markets. Identified use cases and potential problems with Distributed ledger systems. Creating and pitchbooks for startups and companies in various stages of fundraising deals in a variety of sectors.
